author: Brad Colbow
description:
NEW COURSES: http://bradsartschool.com
Tab S10 Lite: https://amzn.to/4mkCzyp (affiliate link)

Current deal on Galaxy Tab S10 FE: https://amzn.to/4gr3F5J (affiliate link)

The Galaxy Tab S10 Lite will probably one day be the best deal in drawing tech. At it's entry price of $350, you can usually find the slightly better S10 FE on sale. But this replaces the Galaxy tab S6 lite and it's a worth upgrade that will serve a lot of aspiring artists well into the future.
